### Tender Notice

**Description**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking industry insight into the expected availability of hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs) and their drop-in replacements. The federal Ozone-Depleting Substances and Halocarbon Alternatives Regulations (ODSHAR) of 2016 have established limits on the importation of HFCs and products containing them. DND requires information on potential supply constraints for HFCs from 2024 to 2030 and suitable alternatives.
